mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SPECIAL FEATURES "U Q 2", "Club That Dares to be Different", "New Barn Bornin' in Missouri", and "Sound System Operation". REGULAR FEATURES "Square Dance Picture", "Square Dance Date Book", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Overseas Dateline", "Dancer's Walkthru", "Style Series: Ladies Center, Back to the Bar", "Ladies on the Square: The Coverup Story", "Americana: Hayseed", "Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month: Burnell Beilke", "Paging the Roundancers: Pete and Helen Mighetto", "Experimental Lab: Uncouple", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
